dc_title_s: Map of Texas and the country adjacent compiled in the Bureau of the Corps of Topographical Engineers, from the best authorities, for the State Department, under the direction of Colonel J.J. Abert, Chief of the Corps; by W.H. Emory, 1st Lieut, T.E.
dc_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Topographical Engineers
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington. Outline color only for Texas. Shows northern Mexico, southwestern U.S., and Texas; includes routes, indian tribes, battle sites, etc. 1 map: hand col.; 35 x 54 cm
